articles.description: Let's take a look at the beautiful vacation pictures of Sara Ali Khan...
articles.content: For the caption, Sara channelled her inner shayar and wrote, "Parvato Mein Parathe..Jannat in Pahad..Chalti Rahi Coffee ke Sahare...Barf mein bhi Bahaare..Toh Azmaao yeh Nazaare."
